name: Cofagrigus
flavorText:
It has been said that they swallow those
who get too close and turn them into
mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.

previous.name: Yamask
previous.flavorText:
Each of them carries a mask that used
to be its face when it was human.
Sometimes they look at it and cry.

next.name: Tirtouga
next.flavorText:
Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon
can dive to depths beyond half a mile.

pokemon.name: Yamask

Each of them carries a mask that used
to be its face when it was human.
Sometimes they look at it and cry.

It has been said that they swallow those

pokemon.name: Runerigus
pokemon.flavorText:
A powerful curse was woven into an ancient
painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask,
the painting began to move.
